data.author: Zevive

changelog.release_notes: Disable debugging option that was accidentally released in last update

data.description:
Get fit and be active, improve your health and well being!
Set your daily step target, add some bots, and race them around the clock.
You can even challenge your friends and verse them in StepVerse, the great new step tracking watchface.

StepVerse has a one-time cost of $1.99 with a three day (72 hours) trial period, via KiezelPay. 
If you love StepVerse, don't forget to give it a ‚ù§!

== Verse your Friends ==
- Easily compare your steps to your friends with the progress lines around the outside.
- Intelligent Timezone support, so you can challenge friends on the other side of the world.
- Notifications when you're winning, gain a place, or lose place, or hit your step target - so you know when you need to keep going and when you can relax.

== Verse the Bots ==
- Add any of the bots just like friends
- Step Target
- Your Average and StepVerse Average
- Fitness Trainer, and Extreme Fitness Trainer
- And more...

== Other features ==
- Steps are synced frequently, so always know who is in the lead.
- Companion website with full configuration, graphs and stats, including daily step totals for your friends for the last 2 weeks.
- Timeline Quick View supported

== Companion App: "StepVerse Friends" ==
- Free when you sign up for StepVerse
- Automatically syncs unobtrusively in the background, so you can keep using your favourite watchface.
- Lists all of your friends and their current step counts.

See: "More from this developer" below

StepVerse Sync API: https://api.stepverse.com
